definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Octahedron slurry pond in the upper intermittent rotation.
sentences.chinese: 八面体在浆池上方间歇性旋转。

sentences.english: A method is proposed for the inverse displacement analysis of the dual double-octahedral variable geometry truss manipulators.
sentences.chinese: 研究了双二重八面体变几何桁架机器人的逆位置分析。

sentences.english: Advanced the octahedron frame model used in overall decision of manufacturing system.
sentences.chinese: 提出了制造系统的八面体总体决策框架模型。

sentences.english: The central metals was six-coordinated with octahedron geometry.
sentences.chinese: 金属中心为六配位略微变形的八面体几何构型。

sentences.english: The octahedral formations drifted apart and the drones spread out in the upper atmosphere.
sentences.chinese: 八面体组合开始分离，蜂群一样飞出上层大气。

sentences.english: An octahedron with eight equilateral triangles as faces.
sentences.chinese: 有八个正三角形面的八面体。

sentences.english: It's a cubic crystal inside of it!
sentences.chinese: 具有完整的立方八面体晶体，高强度和热稳定性。

sentences.english: The main structure unit of clay minerals contains silicon-oxygen tetrahedron and aluminium-oxygen octahedron.
sentences.chinese: 其主要结构单元是硅一氧四面体和铝一氧八面体。

sentences.english: Complete cubic octahedral crystal crystal shape, high strength and thermal stability.
sentences.chinese: 具有完整的立方八面体晶形，高强度和热稳定性。

sentences.english: The simulation calculation for two double- octahedron variable geometry truss manipulators is given.
sentences.chinese: 并对双二重八面体变几何桁架机器人进行了仿真计算。

definition: six-sided figure (such as a cube or parallelepiped)
cubical system (crystallography)/crystal system based on cubic lattice/equiaxial crystal system
crystal lattice (the regular 3-dimensional pattern formed by atoms in a crystal)
enneahedron (solid figure having nine plane faces)
a block/body of person or animal as a block
